DOC.brief_title: A Study Mood Stress After Spinal Cord Injury
DOC.detailed_description: The objective study examine degree vulnerability factor mediate stress increase risk depression SCI sample adult sustain injury age 18 year . Participants complete write survey ( pain , daily activity , social support life experience ) telephone interview provide information factor .
DOC.criteria: Have spinal cord injury Were age 16 year old injured Sudden onset symptom Under 19 year old Less 1 year postinjury nontraumatic injury
